<-- 쪽지 보내기 -->
  
  INSERT INTO message (
    sender, recip, subject, content, msg_date, sender_del, recip_del
  ) VALUES (
    #{sender}, #{recip}, #{subject}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 0
  )


<-- 받은 쪽지 조회 -->
  
  SELECT * 
  FROM message
  WHERE recip = #{user_id}
  AND recip_del = 0
  ORDER BY msg_date DESC
  LIMIT #{msg_count} OFFSET #{offset}


  <-- 보낸 쪽지 조회-->

  SELECT *
  FROM message
  WHERE sender = #{user_id}
    AND sender_del = 0
  ORDER BY msg_date DESC
  LIMIT #{msg_count} OFFSET #{offset}
